thread.title: Berkshire Museum Fight Ends With Approval to Sell Norman Rockwell Painting

author: Jon Kamp
title: Berkshire Museum Fight Ends With Approval to Sell Norman Rockwell Painting

organizations.name: berkshire museum fight ends with approval to sell norman rockwell painting

text:
A Massachusetts court justice ruled Thursday that a struggling museum in western Massachusetts can sell up to 40 pieces of art, including paintings by Norman Rockwell.
The 115-year-old Berkshire Museum in Pittsfield, Mass., has sought to sell the works to raise tens of millions of dollars to renovate its building and strengthen its endowment. The lot includes two paintings that Mr. Rockwell personally donated to the museum.
